results.title: What you need · Colchester City Council
results.snippet: We encourage you to seek pre-application advice or enter into a Planning Performance Agreement (PPA). Without a PPA, we will not provide progress updates.

selected_links.title: What you need · Colchester City Council
strengths: Provides comprehensive information on what is needed for various planning applications
Encourages pre-application advice and Planning Performance Agreement (PPA)
Clear instructions about the lack of progress updates without a PPA
selected_links.reasoning: This link provides a general guide for applicants on what they need to submit during planning applications. The encouragement of pre-application advice or entering into a Planning Performance Agreement is beneficial as it can help streamline the process and ensure all necessary information is provided upfront. The clarification that there will be no progress updates without a PPA is valuable in allowing applicants to understand the implications of not following this advice.

context.need: I'd like to install solar panels on my house and want to know if I need permission to have someone undertake this work.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I'd like to install solar panels on my house and want to know if I need permission to have someone undertake this work.
Reason.answer_quality: The content does not directly address this specific question as it is about planning applications. However, it suggests seeking advice before submitting an application which indirectly implies that certain works may require permissions. However, it doesn't specify if installing solar panels is one of them.
Reason.reasoning: The content suggests general advice for any work that might require planning permission but does not list specific types of works like solar panel installation.
Reason.next_actions: I would contact the Council's Planning Department to clarify whether permission is required for installing solar panels.

analysis.overall_assessment: While the content provides a good introduction to planning applications and general advice, it lacks specific details about individual work types that might require permission. It would be more helpful if there was a clear list or guide addressing various typical works for which permissions may be required.
